changes: Introduced energy tracking variables: lastSlashDistance, currentEnergyEffectiveness
Modified slash processing to consume energy during slashing
Applied energy effectiveness multiplier to scoring
Updated monster slicing to include energy effectiveness in event data

patterns_discovered: Energy consumption tied to slash distance
Dynamic effectiveness multiplier based on energy levels
Energy impacts scoring and game mechanics
gotchas_discovered: Need to reset energy tracking when not slashing
Energy consumption happens dynamically during slash trail creation
recommendations: Consider adding visual feedback for energy levels
Add configuration options for energy consumption rate
